title: cirakAlam nammitini
sahitya:
cirakAlam nammitini cinmayI ninnunE


anupallavi

  paradEvi pAdamula bhrngamai nA manasu sharaNAgati I aDigi sangItam pADunamma


caraNam    dayalEni jIvitam yarthamani talacinE bhayabhaktotO prati dinamaNTi cakkaga
talaci ninnu kolicitivi (cakka) daya cUpavE talli kulamantaga cEsi gururAja pUjitE
